page.title: 07LIFE IN KILMINGTON
page.content: {WHAT THE INHABITANTS THINK. {GOOD THINGS } Nearly everyone said that Kilmington is a very pretty village which has lovely views around it. Other aspects which people like are that it is peaceful and quiet, it is clean and tidy, the people are friendly and are good neighbours, and it is near to the mainline railway station at Axminster. {BAD THINGS. } The things which people do not like are that there are no buses or public transport serving the village, there are no street lights and that it is too far from good amenities. Some said that there are too many old people in Kilmington, not enough night life, too few teenagers and not enough jobs in the area. A few objected to any new buildings.
